item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0085; 02:06AM; 1712 E 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34hVJTu; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 47 firefighters extinguished both fires in 29 minutes. Firefighters conducted thorough searches of both structures to ensure no victims were inside (the 2nd story of the two story craftsman was too damaged to allow for a search). No injuries reported. $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 CM22 E14 E17 E21 E215 E221 E233 E46 EM1 RA14 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0085; 01:38AM; 1712 E 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/34hVJTu; Central-Alameda; Large, outside fire extended into two separate single family dwellings. A one story residence is well involved in fire and a two story (craftsman style) residence has a well developed attic fire. Additional resources were requested (reflected in this alert).; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 CM22 E14 E17 E21 E215 E221 E233 E46 EM1 RA14 SQ21 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FIRE NOW OUT Structure Fire 01/02/2022 INC#1498

item.description: FIRE NOW OUT Structure Fire; INC#1498; 08:04PM; 718 S Union Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zkNS2X; Westlake; The first arriving fire companies extinguished fire in one unit of a four story (pre-1943) center hall apartment building in 10 mins. The fire was contained to the original unit and prevented from damaging other units. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:54PM. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E10 E13 E210 E211 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T9; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0726; 12:39PM; 2899 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EOZMTE; Griffith Park; Firefighters and Park Rangers located an adult female hiker with a non-life threatening injury. LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist operation and hospital transport. The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 12:09PM. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA35 RH114 T35; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0451; 09:18AM; 7423 N Atherton Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HuRRwQ; West Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters located and extinguished an attic fire in 29 minutes. Crews prevented the fire from extending down into the 2nd floor and conducted salvage operations to provide protection for the contents of the rooms. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E106 E273 E293 E296 E305 E72 RA106 T105 T73 T93 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0451; 08:49AM; 7423 N Atherton Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HuRRwQ; West Hills; Two story, single family dwelling with an attic fire. ; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E106 E273 E293 E296 E305 E72 RA106 T105 T73 T93 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1662; 07:59PM; 6881 W Yeager Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/32zlDSk; #HollywoodHills; 29 Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a contents fire on the 2nd (lowest occupied floor) of a 3 story ascending hillside home comprised of 2 occupied floors over garage parking. No injury. Though the specific cause of the fire is still under investigation, firefighters are assessing the possibility that furnishings and/or a rug may have been placed over or too near to a floor furnace that was recently activated.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E261 E76 E82 E97 RA76 T35 T61; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1662; 07:43PM; 6881 W Yeager Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/32zlDSk; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: 3 story ascending hillside home (2 occupied floors over parking) with smoke showing from 2nd floor; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E261 E76 E82 E97 RA76 T35 T61; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0432; 05:15AM; 4367 W Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pJ7GtB; Jefferson Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first assignment of 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes (prior to arrival of the additional resources). Further update on the building appears to be divided into two units with a partition wall separating areas within one unit. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending beyond the original unit (the extent of potential smoke/water damage is unknown at this time). LAPD has one male (age unknown) in custody as a potential arson suspect. Firefighter/paramedics are evaluating him to ensure there are no injuries. No further updates. ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM22 E10 E226 E229 E26 E294 E34 E68 EM11 RA68 RA834 RA94 T26 T29 T94; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0432; 04:48AM; 4367 W Adams Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pJ7GtB; Jefferson Park; One story commercial building (one building divided into three units) with fire showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E229 E26 E294 E34 E68 EM11 RA68 RA834 RA94 T29 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
